titles.title: 630 Theres A Man In The Glory

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
There's a Man in the glory
whose Life is for me
He's pure and He's holy,
triumphant and free
He's wise and He's loving,
how tender is He!

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
His Life in the glory,
my life must be
His Life in the glory,
my life must be

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
There's a Man in the glory
whose Life is for me
He overcame Satan,
from bondage He's free
In Life he is reigning,
how kingly is He!

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
His life in the glory,
my life must be
His life in the glory,
my life must be

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
There's a Man in the glory
whose Life is for me
In Him is no sickness,
no weakness has He
He's strong and in vigor,
how buoyant is He!

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
His life in the glory,
my life may be
His life in the glory,
my life may be

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
There's a Man in the glory
whose Life is for me
His peace is abiding,
how patient is He!
He's joyful and radiant
expecting to see

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
His life in the glory,
lived out in me
His life in the glory,
lived out in me
